price: ߡߎߛߊ߫ ߞߊ߲߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߸ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߓߊ߯ ߞߍ߫ ߝߋ߲ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߝߟߌ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊߟߎ߯ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߝߌ߬ߟߌ߫ ߞߍ߬
arabic: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلۡقُواْ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلۡقُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla lahum mūsā alqū mā antum mul'qūna
